column3: mother-name]] of [[Caranthir]], the fourth [[Sons of Fëanor
column4: son]] of [[Fëanor]]. The word can be translated as "Red-face". ''[[Carnë]]'' in Quenya means "red" or "scarlet".<ref>{{PM
column5: Shibboleth}}, ''The names of the Sons of Fëanor with the legend of the fate of Amrod'', p. 353</ref>
